root.name: Hourai Gakuen no Bouken!
root.description: OverviewHourai Gakuen no Bouken! (Adventures of Hourai High) is a comedy themed Super Famicom RPG developed by Dynamite and published by J-Wing in 1996. The game was never sold outside Japan but a fan translation patch was released by Aeon Genesis on April 19, 2011.
